CustomField.formula: IF (AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Signatures"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Other Party Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Ready for Signatures") ) ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OfflineDocumentImport?id="&Id+"&finishPage=APT_ImportFullySignedDoc", IMAGE("/resource/APT_ImportFullySignedDocument", "Import Fully Signed Document"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Import Fully Signed Document
